ml.alternet.scan

Interface Constraint

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataConstraint<T>, NumberConstraint, StringConstraint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NumberConstraint.NumberClassConstraint, NumberConstraint.Type, StringConstraint.Read_UntilString, StringConstraint.ReadUntilChar, StringConstraint.ReadUntilSingleChar

    public interface Constraint
    A constraint to apply when scanning an input.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    Scanner
